subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP maker
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hey wanderer, (just kidding :) )

for EVPmaker explanations & download, please browse to:
http://www.stefanbion.de/evpmaker/index_e.htm

The sound source file with SpeakJet allophones is in my folder:
http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Stefan/

Stefan

-- 

> Hey guys

> I was wandering if anybody could explain what is this EVP maker, and 
> how it works?  I notice alot going on with this, and I am wandering if 
> I can get an explaination on how, & where to get it, or download it 
> from?  Also what is this file that Stefan has?  Any help is great

> Thanks

> Rees
